name: BETAFPV Betaflight ELRS Cetus X FPV Kit with LiteRadio 3 Transmitter, C04 Camera, VR03 Goggles with DVR Recording Function, Supports 2S Power Advanced RTF Kit for Beginners to Fly Faster and Farther
description: 【Betaflgiht FC Version】This Cetus X FPV Kit comes with the Betaflight Flight Controller, as the advanced ExpressLRS 2S power whoop bundle, which is a completely primary choice to reach a higher stage. Comes with an enhanced propulsion system, VR03 goggles, LiteRadio 3 radio transmitter controller, longer radio and video transmission, pilots can unlock more accomplishments to the next level | 【Camera Version】If the camera is broken and need to replace it, please kindly note before buying a replacement camera for the Cetus X Quadcopter, this Cetus X FPV Kit is the version with Betaflight Flight Controller, which only can install the C04 camera with the M04 VTX, and it can't works with the C04 camere with Cetus Cetus FC version, please select the correct one when you order the replacement camera | 【Camera Signal】The camera will lost the image due to the loose cable and many times of hits, please plug and unplug the cable of the camera if the drone has the issue of lost signal and re-bind the drone with the controller again | 【Firmware & Function】Cetus X FPV Kit comes with the popular firmware in the FPV community. Please make sure the other receivers bind with the controller and have the same firmware version so that they can work together. And this kit also features a function of Betaflight Configurator, which allows pilots to learn how to set up the drone from zero to the next level | 【Calibration】Please re-calibrate the joystick after repeated use or the remote control radio transmitter is subjected to physical impact, or the drone occurs a phenome of the the drone fly to one side. If the drone has something wrong with the prop and motor, please follow the manual to re-calibrate the flight controller
